articles.title: Zcash developer team behind ECC quits after governance clash with Bootstrap board
articles.description: ECC's CEO, Josh Swihart, claims the team was forced to leave because of changes that made their work untenable.

articles.title: India's Tax Department Echoes Reserve Bank's Concerns on Crypto
articles.description: Tax authorities flagged enforcement challenges with virtual digital assets ahead of the Union Budget presentation.

articles.title: Bitcoin price may bottom at $88K next cycle if last CME gap stays open
articles.description: Bitcoin filled one of two new futures gaps with a trip below $90,000 as analysis predicted a potential bottom level for the next BTC price cycle.

articles.title: Binance launches regulated TradFi perpetual contracts settled in USDT, starting with gold and silver
articles.description: Binance has rolled out its first regulated TradFi perpetual futures, starting with USDT-settled gold and silver contracts.

articles.title: CZ-backed YZi Labs escalates fight over CEA’s ‘poison pill’ and BNB treasury strategy
articles.description: YZi Labs is challenging CEA Industries’ newly adopted poison pill and bylaw changes, accusing the board of entrenchment and misrepresenting its commitment to a BNB treasury.

articles.title: BitMine buys $105M Ether to kick off 2026, still holds $915M in cash
articles.description: The largest corporate ETH holder started 2026 with a $105 million Ether purchase, while surpassing $2.87 billion in staked Ether, seeking to generate passive yield on its holdings.

articles.title: India tax authorities warn crypto undermines tax enforcement
articles.description: Officials told a parliamentary panel that private wallets, offshore exchanges and cross-border DeFi activity make tracking taxable crypto income difficult.

articles.title: XRP ETFs notch first outflows as nearly $600M exits Bitcoin, Ether funds
articles.description: XRP ETFs logged their first net outflow day since launch, breaking a multi-week inflow streak after more than $1 billion poured into the funds.

articles.title: Zcash developers quit, form new company after board clash
articles.description: The entire Electric Coin Company team behind Zcash resigned after a governance dispute with its nonprofit board, says CEO Josh Swihart.

articles.title: Spot XRP ETFs see first net outflows since debut, worth $41 million
articles.description: Spot bitcoin and ether ETFs reported net outflows as well, with one analyst pointing to profit-taking after the recent market rally.

articles.title: Morgan Stanley’s Bitcoin ETF could offer strategic value beyond inflows, analysts say
articles.description: Analysts say the bank’s late entry into spot Bitcoin ETFs may still carry reputational and strategic upside across its brokerage and crypto ambitions.

articles.title: Zcash devs split from Electric Coin Company, plan to create new firm
articles.description: Electric Coin Company CEO Josh Swihart says the firm's entire team left and will start a new company over disagreements with the nonprofit board that supports Zcash.

articles.title: Solana Accelerate to open Consensus Hong Kong in February
articles.description: CoinDesk and the Solana Foundation said the developer event will kick off Consensus Hong Kong on Feb. 11, setting the tone for a week focused on builders, capital, and policymakers.

articles.title: AI giant Anthropic raising $10B at $350B valuation: Report
articles.description: Claude maker Anthropic is aiming to nearly double its valuation to $350 billion, with The Wall Street Journal reporting a planned $10 billion raise.

articles.title: Bitcoin drops below $90,000 after early January pop as BTC ETFs see $480 million outflows
articles.description: The crypto market's movements are influenced by expectations of Federal Reserve rate cuts and a rally in global government bonds.

articles.title: Memecoin social buzz grows as traders return to risk assets
articles.description: Memecoins fell 65% over 2025 as risk-taking behavior dropped among traders, but the tokens are seeing gains as positive sentiment returns to crypto.

articles.title: XRP slips 5% as CNBC terms it 'hottest trade' of 2026 over bitcoin and ether
articles.description: Institutional demand through U.S.-listed spot XRP ETFs remains strong, with net inflows continuing into early January.

articles.title: Google, Character.AI Agree to Settle US Lawsuit Over Teen’s Suicide
articles.description: A lawsuit alleging an AI chatbot contributed to a teen’s suicide has been settled, closing a closely watched case over AI accountability.

articles.title: Kalshi CEO endorses bill banning insider trading on prediction markets
articles.description: Mansour distanced Kalshi from 'offshore, unregulated' prediction market platforms with alleged cases of insider trading.

articles.title: Solana Mobile to launch SKR token for Seeker phone on Jan. 21
articles.description: Solana Mobile will airdrop up to 20% of SKR tokens to users of its Seeker phone on Jan. 21, and introduce so-called Guardians to secure the network.

articles.title: Ethereum bumps blob capacity as it gears for Fusaka upgrade
articles.description: Ethereum increased its data capacity per block, raising the blob target to 14 and the maximum blob limit to 21.

articles.title: 3 ‘checkpoints’ stand between a crypto all-time high in 2026: Bitwise
articles.description: Bitwise’s Matt Hougan says that post-October liquidation stability, the passage of the CLARITY Act and steady equities must happen before crypto hits new highs.

articles.title: Three Catalysts That Could Kickstart a Crypto Rally in 2026: Bitwise
articles.description: Bitcoin’s next rally hinges on market stability, with analysts pointing to calmer crypto conditions and progress on U.S. crypto legislation.

articles.title: Bitcoin faces ‘boring sideways’ grind in coming months: CryptoQuant CEO
articles.description: CryptoQuant CEO Ki Young Ju says money flowing into Bitcoin has “dried up” for now, as traders are rotating back to traditional markets.

articles.title: Fireblocks buys crypto accounting platform TRES for $130M
articles.description: Fireblocks is expanding its institutional stack with a $130 million acquisition of TRES, a crypto accounting and tax compliance platform.

articles.title: World Liberty Financial Applies for OCC Trust Bank Charter
articles.description: World Liberty Financial is seeking to overcome a federal oversight hurdle, with only one other crypto firm having successfully done so.

articles.title: GENIUS Act changes would be a ‘national security trap’: Crypto execs
articles.description: Pro-crypto lawyer John Deaton argued that banning yield on stablecoins would incentivize the use of China’s interest-bearing digital yuan, hurting the US dollar.

articles.title: OpenAI’s ChatGPT Health Push Raises Questions About Data Security
articles.description: The new feature lets users link medical records, while OpenAI emphasized encryption, data separation, and limits on health advice.

articles.title: Wyoming rolls out state-backed FRNT stablecoin to the public
articles.description: Wyoming’s Frontier Stable Token (FRNT) is “the first fiat-backed, fully-reserved stable token” to be issued by a US public entity, says Governor Mark Gordon.

articles.title: Sei warns USDC.n token holders to swap for ‘native’ stablecoin ahead of planned upgrade
articles.description: USDC.n served as the canonical representation of the popular stablecoin on the Sei Network before Circle issued a native version of the token.

articles.title: Crypto credit is starting to look like cash savings accounts: Asia Morning Briefing
articles.description: Flowdesk says record demand met even deeper liquidity, suppressing volatility across staking, stablecoin lending, making crypto credit markets look more like traditional cash plumbing.

articles.title: Ethereum rolls out final planned Blob Parameters Only fork as final step in Fusaka upgrade
articles.description: Fusaka, activated in early December, introduced the “Blob Parameters Only” upgrade mechanism to ramp up Ethereum's data availability.

articles.title: Trump family’s World Liberty Financial applies for banking charter to expand USD1
articles.description: World Liberty Financial has applied for a national trust banking charter to issue, custody and redeem its USD1 stablecoin under US banking oversight.

articles.title: Trump-linked World Liberty Financial-connected firm applies for federal bank charter
articles.description: World Liberty Financial is trying to launch the World Liberty Trust Company, a stablecoin-focused national trust bank, it said Wednesday.

articles.title: This is what's (currently) in the way of U.S. crypto market structure bill harmony
articles.description: Though consequential Senate committee votes may be coming, the talks over the bill's language haven't yet satisfied fundamental requests from Democrats.

articles.title: Trump-backed World Liberty Financial seeks US bank charter to bring USD1 stablecoin fully onshore
articles.description: The DeFi protocol said WLTC Holdings LLC filed an application to establish a national trust bank purpose-built for stablecoin operations.

articles.title: Solana Mobile Gears Up to Airdrop SKR Token to Seeker Phone Users—But Not Saga Owners
articles.description: Solana Mobile announced it will airdrop its native ecosystem token, SKR, to Seeker device users and app developers on January 20.

articles.title: Elon Musk: Nvidia’s Self-Driving Tech Is Still Years From Challenging Tesla
articles.description: Tesla CEO Elon Musk argued that Nvidia’s software has arrived years earlier than legacy automakers can deploy it at scale.

articles.title: Solana’s stablecoin market cap surges by $900M in 24 hours
articles.description: Stablecoins are emerging as critical infrastructure across both decentralized and traditional financial applications worldwide.

articles.title: Nike sells RTFKT digital collectibles unit to unnamed buyer: reports
articles.description: Last year, RTFKT said it would wind down following several successful drops that have brought in nearly $50 million in lifetime earnings.

articles.title: Crypto reps fly to US Capitol this week to address market structure bill
articles.description: The Digital Chamber will facilitate engagement with representatives from several digital asset companies in Washington, D.C., on Thursday, ahead of a markup on a major crypto bill.

articles.title: Polymarket Begins Rolling Out Fees in US App and Crypto Markets
Gate becomes latest crypto exchange to embed AI market intelligence
articles.description: The new GateAI feature offers automated market summaries and decision-support tools without enabling automated trading.

articles.title: Wyoming's 'Frontier' Stablecoin Debuts—Will It Offer Yield?
articles.description: The Wyoming Frontier Stable Token is now available to the public, four months after its official launch.

articles.title: Senate Agriculture Committee to follow Banking panel in crypto vote next week: report
articles.description: The Senate Agriculture Committee has previously released a discussion draft of its market structure legislation.

articles.title: Babylon receives $15M from a16z Crypto to expand Bitcoin-native lending
articles.description: The investment was made through the purchase of BABY tokens to support the development of Babylon’s trustless Bitcoin collateral infrastructure.

articles.title: 60K Bitcoin absorbed by accumulators as miners send it to exchanges: Will rally stall?
articles.description: Bitcoin accumulators absorbed 60,000 BTC, but miners sending their rewards to exchanges may lead to overhanging sell pressure.
